abort.connection_error: Could not fetch account information. Is the user registered in the Spotify Developer Dashboard?
abort.missing_configuration: The Spotify integration is not configured. Please follow the documentation.
abort.no_url_available: No URL available. For information about this error, [check the help section]({docs_url})
abort.oauth_unauthorized: OAuth authorization error while obtaining access token.
abort.reauth_account_mismatch: The Spotify account authenticated with, does not match the account needed re-authentication.

reauth_confirm.description: The Spotify integration needs to re-authenticate with Spotify for account: {account}
reauth_confirm.title: Authentication expired for {name}
